Title: Adobe Flash Player: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Adobe Flash Player,
    worst of which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

Background.Text: The Adobe Flash Player is a renderer for the SWF file format, which is commonly used to provide interactive websites.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Adobe Flash Player. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Adobe Flash Player users should upgrade to the latest version:
